an3.39:1.3: bhikkhave, uppalaṃ → sudaṃ uppalaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vappati → pupphati (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.39:1.4: akāsikaṃ candanaṃ dhāremi → kāsikaṃ candanaṃ dhāremi (sya-all, km, mr); akāsikaṃ dhāremi (?)
an3.39:1.5: Rattindivaṃ → rattidivaṃ (mr) | pana me su taṃ → panassu me taṃ (bj); pana su me taṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.39:2.2: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (bj, sya-all, km, mr); parivāriyamāno (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.39:11.2: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemataṃ → nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
